definitions: To present (someone) to another for the first time.
To bring (something) into use or existence for the first time.
To make (something) known for the first time.
To present a bill or motion in a legislative body.
examples: Let me introduce you to my colleague.
The company plans to introduce a new product next quarter.
He introduced the topic with a brief overview.
She carefully introduced the needle into the fabric.
The senator will introduce the new bill tomorrow.
